// {{{ NX.Function.flexSetter

/**
 * @class NX.Function
 */

/**
 * @method flexSetter
 *
 * "write it"
 *
 * @param o {Object} xxx
 * @return {Object}
 */
module.exports = function(fn) {

    return function(a, b) {

        var k, i;

        if(a === null) {
            return this;
        }

        if(typeof a !== 'string') {

            for(k in a) {

                if(a.hasOwnProperty(k)) {

                    fn.call(this, k, a[k]);

                }

            }

        } else {

            fn.call(this, a, b);

        }

        return this;
    };

};

// }}}

/*
 * Local variables:
 * tab-width: 4
 * c-basic-offset: 4
 * c-hanging-comment-ender-p: nil
 * End:
 */
